def is_remote_control_nearby(dvd_player:item, remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control is close to the DVD player
    symbol is_nearby=close(remote_control, dvd_player)
    return is_nearby

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(dvd_player:item, remote_control:item):
    body:
        assert is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Assert that the item is a remote control
        if is_remote_control_nearby(dvd_player, remote_control):
            # Check if the remote control is close to the DVD player
            achieve facing_char(char, remote_control)
            achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        else:
            observe(remote_control, "Move close to dvd_player and use to turn it on")
            # If remote is not nearby, observe and ensure its moved close to DVD player
            achieve facing_char(char, dvd_player)
            achieve is_on(dvd_player)

        # Select a dvd_player

            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Select a remote control

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote:item, dvd:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote)
        # Ensures the remote is held only when necessary
        achieve facing_char(char, dvd)
        # Ensure the character is facing the DVD player
        achieve is_on(dvd)
        # Turns on the DVD player using the remote
